sp_widget.name: Slush Bucket
sp_widget.option_schema: [{"hint":"Table that you would like the available slush bucket to have entries from","name":"available_table","section":"other","label":"Available Table","type":"string"},{"hint":"Query to apply to the available table","name":"available_table_query","section":"other","label":"Available Table Query","type":"string"},{"hint":"Table you would like to pull values from for the selected bucket","name":"selected_table","section":"other","label":"Selected Table","type":"string"},{"hint":"Query to apply to the selected table","name":"selected_table_query","section":"other","label":"Selected Table Query","type":"string"}]
